name: 灯織
text:
……っ……！
まだまだダメ、もう１度……
trans:
...Nnh...!
Still not good enough, one more time!

name: 真乃
text: あ、あれ？　灯織ちゃん？
trans: Huh? Hiori-chan?

name: 灯織
text: ……！　櫻木さん。おはよう
trans: ...! Sakuragi-san, good morning.

name: 真乃
text:
お、おはよう。灯織ちゃん、早いんだね
レッスンの時間、まだなのに
trans:
G-Good morning. Hiori-chan, you're here early.
There's still some time before our lesson...

name: 灯織
text:
……気になるところがあったから、確かめておきたくて
少しでも進めておかないと、後で困るだろうし……
trans:
...There are some parts that I'm not too sure about,
so I wanted to practice. If I can't improve even just a
little, it'll cause trouble in the future...

name: 真乃
text: ほわ……すごい……
trans: Howa... that's amazing...

name: 灯織
text: え？
trans: Eh?

name: 真乃
text: あ、ごめんねっ。あの、変な意味じゃなくて
trans: Ah, I'm sorry. Umm, I don't mean it in a weird way...

name: 真乃
text:
灯織ちゃんは、これからのことを考えて、
今頑張ってるんだなって思ったから……
trans:
Hiori-chan, you're thinking way ahead, while doing
your best to prepare now, is what I was thinking...

name: 灯織
text:
それは……当たり前のことじゃない？
櫻木さんは違うの？
trans:
That's... just natural, isn't it?
Is it any different for you, Sakuragi-san?

name: 真乃
text: も、もちろんそうなんだけどっ
trans: O-Of course that's true, but...

name: 真乃
text:
……でも、私だったらきっと、
目の前のことでいっぱいいっぱいになっちゃうと思うんだ
trans:
If it were me, I think I'd be too preoccupied with
everything going on right now to even think that far.

name: 真乃
text:
だから、灯織ちゃんはすごいなって！
私も、見習わないと……
trans:
That's why I think you're really amazing, Hiori-chan!
I should try to be more like you...

name: 灯織
text: そんな、すごいことってわけじゃ……
trans: No way, it's really nothing amazing like...

name: 真乃
text:
そ、そんなことは……！
……えっ、と……
trans:
That's not true...!
...Ah, umm...

name: めぐる
text:
おっはよー！
みんなそろってるー？
trans:
Morning!
Is everyone here?

name: 真乃
text:
あ、めぐるちゃん……！
おはよう
trans:
Ah, Meguru-chan...!
Good morning.

name: 灯織
text: ……おはよう、八宮さん
trans: ...Good morning, Hachimiya-san.

name: めぐる
text:
えへへ、揃ってたね。わたしが最後だったか
ふたりとも、もうレッスン始めてた？
trans:
Eheheh, guess everyone's here. So I was the last one,
huh? Have you two started the lesson?

name: 真乃
text:
ううん
私も、今来たばかりだから
trans: No, I just got here too.

name: 灯織
text: ……時間だよ。そろそろ、始めよう
trans: ......It's time. We should get started.

name: めぐる
text:
よーし！
気合入れていこー！
trans:
All right!
Time to get pumped up!

name: 灯織
text:
まずはボイストレーニングからだね
３人で声を合わせてみよう
trans:
We'll be starting with voice training.
Let's try harmonizing our voices together.

name: 灯織
text: ……ふぅ……一旦、休憩にしようか
trans: ...Phew... Let's take a short break.

name: めぐる
text: そうだねー……！　お疲れさま～！
trans: Yeah, let's do that! Good work so far!

name: 真乃
text: お疲れさま……！
trans: Good work...!

name: めぐる
text: ……真乃、すごいね。すっごく綺麗な声だった！
trans:
...Mano, that was great! Your singing voice is so
gorgeous!

name: 真乃
text:
ほわっ。そ、そう、かな……？
自分では、よくわからないけど……
trans:
Howa, i-is that so...?
I can't really tell myself...

name: 灯織
text:
私も綺麗だと思った。その声、櫻木さんの魅力だから
しっかりと自覚をもって伸ばしていった方がいい
trans:
I thought it was beautiful too. Your voice is part of
your charm, so you should be aware of it and keep
developing it.

name: 真乃
text:
灯織ちゃんまで……
その、ありがとう……！
trans:
Hiori-chan too...
Umm, thank you...!

name: 灯織
text:
……もう少し休んだら、次はダンスレッスンに移ろう
振りつけの確認から、軽く踊ってみるところまで
trans:
...After our break, let's switch to dance practice.
We'll start by checking the choreography, then
dancing a little.

name: 真乃
text: うんっ
trans: Yeah.

name: めぐる
text: オッケー！
trans: OK!

name: めぐる
text:
……じゃあ、最後はわたしの番だね！
いっくよー！
trans:
...Then, last is my turn!
Here I go!

name: 灯織
text: 八宮さん、すごく楽しそうに踊ってる……
trans:
Hachimiya-san looks like she's really having fun
dancing...

name: 真乃
text:
ほわぁ……
めぐるちゃん、すごい……
trans:
Howa...
Meguru-chan, you're so cool...

name: 真乃
text: 鳥さんが……空を飛んでるみたいな……
trans: Just like a bird... flying in the sky...

name: 灯織
text: ……私も、負けてられないな……
trans: ...I can't lose to her, either...

name: めぐる
text: ……よしっ。こんな感じかな！
trans: ...All right, guess that's how it goes!

name: めぐる
text: これで１周だねっ
trans: That's one set done!

name: 灯織
text:
お疲れ様
八宮さんのダンス、すごくキレがあった
trans:
Good work.
Hachimiya-san, your dance was full of vigor.

name: めぐる
text:
ほんとっ？　ありがとう！
いろいろ助っ人やってたおかげかな？
trans:
Really? Thanks!
Maybe it's because I played a few different sports?

name: めぐる
text: やっぱり、体を動かすのってすっごく楽しい！
trans: Yeah, moving my body around like this is so much fun!

name: 真乃
text: めぐるちゃんは、ダンスが好きなんだね
trans: So Meguru-chan, do you like dancing?

name: めぐる
text: そうかも！　えへへー、また好きなものが増えちゃった
trans: Guess so! Eheheh, I found yet another thing I like.

name: 灯織
text: ……今度は、歌とダンスを合わせてみよう
trans:
...This time, let's try singing and dancing at the same
time.

name: めぐる
text: ダメだぁ……！　何回やっても合わないよ～……！
trans:
No way...! We've tried so many times but it
isn't coming together...!

name: 真乃
text:
ほわ……ごめんなさい……
私、上手くできなくて……
trans:
Howa... I'm sorry...
I couldn't do it well enough...

name: 灯織
text:
…………
ふたりとも、大丈夫？
trans:
......
Are you two alright?

name: めぐる
text:
うん、大丈夫だよ。ごめんね、ついていけてなくて
混乱しないでできてるの、灯織だけだったね
trans:
Yeah, I'm okay. Sorry for not being able to follow
along. Hiori, you're the only one who could do both
without getting confused.

name: 真乃
text:
灯織ちゃん、すごく上手だった……！
どうやったら、いいのかな……
trans:
Hiori-chan, you were really good...
How can I do it like you...?

name: 灯織
text:
……バランス、かな
歌とダンス、どちらかにかかりきりになったらダメなの
trans:
...Keeping it balanced, I suppose. It's not good to
focus too much on either the song or the dance.

name: 灯織
text: 体が完全に覚えるまで、反復練習をして……
trans:
Keep practicing over and over until it becomes
muscle memory...

name: 灯織
text:
……とにかく。慣れるまでは、繰り返すしかないよ
たくさん練習しないと
trans:
...Anyways, until you get used to it, it's crucial to
keep repeating it. We have to practice even more.

name: めぐる
text:
そっか、そうだね！　レッスンあるのみだ！
真乃、追いつけるように、一緒に頑張ろうね！
trans:
I see, that's so true! It's all about practice!
Mano, let's work hard together to catch up!

name: 真乃
text: うん……！
trans: Yeah...!

name: めぐる
text: 今日はお疲れ！　次もよろしくねっ
trans: Thanks for today! See you next time.

name: 灯織
text: お疲れ様。また次のレッスンで
trans: Good work today. Until the next lesson.

name: 真乃
text: うん。お疲れさま……！
trans: Yeah, see you...!

name: 真乃
trans: Howa...

name: 真乃
text: （……今日のレッスン、ダメダメだったな……）
trans: (...I didn't do well in today's lesson...)

name: 真乃
text:
（灯織ちゃんは努力家だし、
めぐるちゃんはパワーがあって……）
trans:
(Hiori-chan is such a hard worker,
and Meguru-chan is full of power...)

name: 真乃
text:
（今のままじゃ、
きっと、みんなに迷惑をかけちゃう……）
trans:
(If this keeps up,
I'll just be holding everyone back...)

name: 真乃
text: ……がんばらないと……
trans: ...I've got to keep trying...

name: 真乃
text:
（灯織ちゃんとめぐるちゃんと３人で、
イルミネーションスターズになるために──）
trans:
(So that Hiori-chan, Meguru-chan and I,
the three of us can become illumination STARS.)

name: 真乃
text:
……よーし、頑張るぞっ
むんっ
trans:
...Alright, I'll give it my all!
Mun!
